title: E. Tautz London Collections A/W 15 Men Show
description:
Behind the scenes at E. Tautz London Collections Men A/W15 Show (sponsored by Braun)

Take an exclusive look behind the scenes at the E. Tautz show with E. Tautz Creative Director Patrick Grant, and Braun Brand Ambassador, Fabio Vivan.
 
Visit www.braun.c

asset.author: Braun
asset.hookText:
Behind the scenes at E. Tautz London Collections Men A/W15 Show (sponsored by Braun)

Take an exclusive look behind the scenes at the E. Tautz show with E. Tautz Creative Director Patrick Grant, and Braun Brand Ambassador, Fabio Vivan.
 
Visit www.braun.com and www.etautz.com for more information, or check out the brands’ respective social channels below:
 
Braun
https://twitter.com/braun
https://www.facebook.com/braun
 
E. Tautz
https://twitter.com/etautz
https://www.facebook.com/E.Tautz
http://instagram.com/ETautz/
 
More information about the partnership
This January, Braun continued its partnership with E. Tautz by sponsoring the brand’s show at London Collections: Men A/W15. The partnership was centred on the Male Power Grooming products available from Braun and builds on the brand’s growing reputation as the premium brand for facial hair styling. Braun’s renowned combination of design and functionality fits perfectly with the character of Patrick Grant’s latest E. Tautz collection, which captures the essence of working life in the North of England as portrayed by the likes of Douglas Dunn and L. S. Lowry.
